articles.title: Active Shooter Reported Around Emory University
articles.description: Georgia authorities identify suspect in shooting near Emory University. The Georgia Bureau of Investigation on Saturday identified the gunman as 30-year-old Patrick Joseph White, of Kennesaw, Georgia. A police officer was killed in the incident.

articles.title: Wildfires Rage in Atlantic Canada as Extreme Heat Grips the Region
articles.description: Wildfires are burning out of control in Newfoundland and Labrador, with almost 3,000 individuals under an evacuation order. New Brunswick has also implemented restrictions to keep people safe amid high temperatures, low humidity, and elevated winds.

articles.title: Trump-Putin Summit in Alaska: India Welcomes Talks Amidst Russia-Ukraine Conflict
articles.description: India has welcomed the upcoming summit between US President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin in Alaska, viewing it as a potential step towards ending the Russia-Ukraine conflict. The summit is scheduled for August 15.
